properties.body:
NGA MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION WATCH IS DEGRADED
IN ITS ABILITY TO MONITOR MESSAGES IN THE ATLANTIC
OCEAN REGION AND MEDITERRANEAN SEA. VESSELS IN
THESE AREAS ARE ADVISED TO MAINTAIN SITUATIONAL
AWARENESS USING ALL AVAILABLE MEANS INCLUDING
NAVTEX RECEIVERS IN COASTAL REGIONS. FOR URGENT
REQUESTS, CONTACT NGA NAVSAFETY, DSN: 547 5455,
COMM: 800 362 6289 OR 571 557 5455,
E-MAIL: NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL OR MSG TO
NGA NAVSAFETY WASHINGTON DC.
